name: Minimum Spanning Tree
description:
I like graph theory. And this game is a small introduction to the world of infinite possibilities of it. Well, kind of...

#ArialGang

Created in 5 hours 20 minutes for trijam-83. The theme was '"trees"'. 

Third-party assets:

  • Music "Lifewave 2k" by cynicmusic. (CC0)
  • Sound effects obtained from https://www.zapsplat.com

(I hate dfs)

Oh, btw https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Minimum_spanning_tree
